citations.narrative:
ANIMAL AREAS SHALL BE MAINTAINED IN GOOD REPAIR TO PROTECT THE ANIMALS FROM INJURY. AN
ELECTRIC CORD FOR A HEAT LAMP IS RUNNING THROUGH THE ENCLOSURE FOR A FLYING SQUIRREL.
THIS CORD NEEDS TO BE ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE ENCLOSURE TO PREVENT THE SQUIRREL FROM
CHEWING IT AND BECOMING INJURED.
CORRECT BY: FEBRUARY 3, 2014
THIS ROUTINE INSPECTION AND EXIT BRIEFING WAS CONDUCTED WITH THE LICENSEE.
END OF REPORT.

narrative:
3.125(a)
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
ANIMAL AREAS SHALL BE MAINTAINED IN GOOD REPAIR TO PROTECT THE ANIMALS FROM INJURY.  AN
ELECTRIC CORD FOR A HEAT LAMP IS RUNNING THROUGH THE ENCLOSURE FOR A FLYING SQUIRREL. 
THIS CORD NEEDS TO BE ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE ENCLOSURE TO PREVENT THE SQUIRREL FROM
CHEWING IT AND BECOMING INJURED. 
CORRECT BY: FEBRUARY 3, 2014
THIS ROUTINE INSPECTION AND EXIT BRIEFING WAS CONDUCTED WITH THE LICENSEE.
END OF REPORT.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
